item.description:
(THIS EVENT IS HOSTED BY CHRISTINA - sounds like a great time!)

On 11/10, Boston Bhangra will have a competition pre-party at Felt and all are welcome to join! If you like to dance, this is the place to be! Email an RSVP with your name and phone number before Friday to stereotipe22@hotmail.com. We will be meeting in the first floor bar at Felt at 10:30pm. My member profile has my photo. If you arrive later send a text message to 774-218-3282, so that you can find us!

Here's the description of the event from the Boston Bhangra website:

Location: Felt Night Club

Directions: 533 Washington Street, Boston, MA

Time: 10:30 PM

Age: 21 Plus

Admission: FREE!!!

Description: Watch DJ Pup Dawg mix up the best bhangra beats, hip hop, and reggae all night long! We will also be giving away FREE tickets to the Boston Bhangra Afterparty all night long! FREE PARTY, FREE TICKETS! You can't go wrong! We expect a capacity crowd and you will have fun! Special appearances by guest artists! You can't go wrong as the night is FREE! Come and Enjoy Boston Bhangra! This is the official pre-party to one of the biggest South Asian events in New England!

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Bhangra Party @ Felt - THIS FRIDAY!
